title: Chargeback Win Kit — Visa 10.4 (Fraud)
prompt: Draft a Visa 10.4 representment for {{order_id}} {{amount}} {{order_date}}. Map evidence to 10.4 criteria. Include: 3-D Secure data, AVS/CVV, IP/device, delivery proof, prior comms. Close with issuer guidance.

title: Chargeback Win Kit — Mastercard 4853
prompt: Draft a Mastercard 4853 representment for {{order_id}} {{amount}} {{order_date}}. Map evidence to the 4853 documentation list. Include identity/auth evidence, usage logs, delivery, support thread, refund policy, terms consent.

title: Chargeback Win Kit — Amex Unauthorized
prompt: Draft an Amex unauthorized-dispute representment for {{order_id}} {{amount}} {{order_date}}. Map evidence to Amex checklist: device fingerprint, AVS/CVV, proof-of-receipt, KYC, comms.

title: ClientReach — Overdue Invoice Nudge
prompt: Follow-up for Invoice {{invoice_number}} ({{amount}}) sent {{sent_date}}. Include {{pay_url}} and two call slots. Tone: confident, respectful, direct. Keep to {{word_limit}} words.

title: Lead Gen — Local Services (≤75 words)
prompt: Write a {{channel}} outreach for a {{industry}} {{role}} offering {{service}} in {{city}}. Include one proof ({{proof_point}}) and a single CTA to book a {{time_window}} using {{cta_link}}.

title: Ops — SOP Writer
prompt: Turn a process description into an SOP with Roles, Tools, Steps, QA checks, and Risks. Output Markdown. Ask for missing inputs before drafting.
